page.title: 04Leaving School
page.content: During the past four years I have been a pupil at St.Stephen's Roman Catholic Aided Junior School.I am in the 4th year now and have to leave at the end of this term. I am very frightened. I will be going to English Martyrs'R.C. Comprehensive School in September after the long holiday. It is on the same site as our school but the two schools are very different. The comprehensive school is so big that I am afraid that I will get lost.There will be three forms of entry for 1st year pupils and many of my friends will be in other classes to me. The older classes have more than 3 forms but there are fewer children now than there once were so classes are getting fewer too. By Sharon Ireland age 11
